mapper.insert: insert into diary (user_no,diary_context,diary_isopen, diary_iscomment,diary_date,diary_image) values (#{user_no},#{diary_context}, #{diary_isopen},#{diary_iscomment}, now(),#{diary_image})
mapper.update: update diary set diary_context = #{diary_context}, diary_isopen = #{diary_isopen}, diary_iscomment = #{diary_iscomment} where diary_no=#{diary_no}
mapper.select: select user_no, diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image, ifnull((select diary_no from bookmark b where user_no=#{user_no} and b.diary_no=d.diary_no), 0) as is_bookmark from diary d where diary_no = #{diary_no}
select user_no, diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where user_no = #{no} order by diary_date desc limit 0, 5

select d.user_no, d.diary_no, d.diary_date, d.diary_context, d.diary_isopen, d.diary_iscomment, d.diary_image, ifnull((select diary_no from bookmark b where user_no=#{no} and b.diary_no=d.diary_no), 0) as is_bookmark from diary d where diary_isopen=1 order by diary_date desc limit 0, 5

select user_no, diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where diary_no in (select diary_no from bookmark where user_no = #{no}) order by diary_date desc limit 0, 5
select user_no, diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where user_no = #{no} order by diary_date desc limit #{page}, 5

select d.user_no, d.diary_no, d.diary_date, d.diary_context, d.diary_isopen, d.diary_iscomment, d.diary_image, ifnull((select diary_no from bookmark b where user_no=#{no} and b.diary_no=d.diary_no), 0) as is_bookmark from diary d where diary_isopen=1 order by diary_date desc limit #{page}, 5

select user_no, diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where diary_no in (select diary_no from bookmark where user_no = #{no}) order by diary_date desc limit #{page}, 5
